comments.name: remarks
comments.value:
Triggers an entity type event.
For every entity, a number of events are defined in an entities' definition for key entity behaviors; for example, creepers have a minecraft:start_exploding type event.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Name of the entity type event to trigger. If a namespace is not specified, minecraft: is assumed.

comments.name: throws
comments.value: If the event is not defined in the definition of the entity, an error will be thrown.
